li.label: cowardly
li.description: NAME always shies away from danger. HECAP is usually the first to flee from battle.

li.label: brave
li.description: Few things scare NAME. In battle HE stands unfazed where others panic and flee.

li.label: fearless
li.description: NAME laughs in the face of danger. Some ascribe it to bravery, others to stupidity. Either way, NAME seems to lack any sense of self-preservation and will never flee from a threatening situation.
